description: The new content keeps coming for NBA Playgrounds! With the Hot ’N Frosty expansion pack, you get 8 new unlockable NBA rookies (Markelle Fultz, Jayson Tatum, Lonzo Ball, Josh Jackson, De’Aaron Fox, Dennis Smith Jr., Jonathan Isaac, Malik Monk), 3 original playgrounds (Miami, Rio, Toronto), 3 fresh tournaments, and 3 brand new balls.
name: NBA Playgrounds - Hot ’N Frosty
